text: Sterling Burton Marlin (born June 30, 1957) is an American former stock car racing driver. He formerly competed in the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series. He won the Daytona 500 in 1994 and 1995. He is the son of late NASCAR driver Coo Coo Marlin. In October 2012, Marlin was diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. ==References== ==Other websites== *Sterling Marlin at The Crittenden Automotive Library Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Sportspeople from Tennessee Category:NASCAR drivers
title: Sterling Marlin
